alert.note: Alert for Greensville; Isle of Wight; Southampton; Surry; Sussex (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 5:26PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Northampton, western Hertford, southeastern Greensville, southwestern Isle of Wight, Southampton, Sussex and south central Surry Counties, the City of Franklin and the City of Emporia through 630 PM EDT... At 525 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Carson to near Roanoke Rapids. Movement was east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and heavy downpours. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Franklin, Emporia, Murfreesboro, Waverly, Courtland, Garysburg, Wakefield, Boykins, Dahlia, Chowan University, Sussex, Conway, Woodland, Jarratt, Seaboard, Ivor, Newsoms, Como, Hunterdale and Green Plain. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Greensville; Isle of Wight; Southampton; Surry; Sussex
